sentences.en: A tallow candle with a rush stem as the wick.
sentences.cn: 一种以灯芯草茎为灯芯的动物脂肪作成的蜡烛。

sentences.en: A wick connects it to a reservoir.
sentences.cn: 一灯芯绳把它与水槽相连.

sentences.en: At once I turn up the wick of my kerosene lamp.
sentences.cn: 灯火的带子也即刻被我旋高了.

sentences.en: It is the handwheel adjustment of the kerosene stove wick.
sentences.cn: 这是煤油炉炉芯的手轮调节处.

sentences.en: It's very hard to turn the wick up and down.
Its small wick flickered weakly, illuminating only a small part of the room.
sentences.cn: 一点豆大的暗淡的灯光无力地摇晃着, 只照亮了这个房间的小部分.

sentences.en: She's always talking about herself — she gets on my wick.
sentences.cn: 她总是在谈论自己,这真让我恼火.

sentences.en: The boss gets on my wick with his everlasting complaints about timekeeping. And he thinks nothing of rolling up to the office at ten o'clock himself.
sentences.cn: 上司总是抱怨说我们不守时,真令我烦透了. 可是他对自己10点钟才到办公室却一点也不在乎.

sentences.en: The ceramic lamp and wick change, but the light's the same.
sentences.cn: 陶制的灯与灯芯会改变, 但灯光都是一样的.

sentences.en: The gloom of the room closed in on her as the wick again dwindled.
sentences.cn: 周围的黑暗向她包围过来.灯光因了灯花增大而变得更微弱了.

sentences.en: The grass can be used as the wick of a lamp.
sentences.cn: 这些草可以用来做灯捻.

sentences.en: The light is getting weaker . Turn up the wick, please.
sentences.cn: 光线越来越暗,你去挑挑灯芯.

sentences.en: The Professor was beginning to get on Molly's wick.
sentences.cn: 教授快要把莫莉惹毛了。

sentences.en: The temperature of the wick and the bulb falls below that of the air.
sentences.cn: 纱布与感温球的温度下降而低于空气的温度.

sentences.en: Then with dragging feet she walked over to the table and trimmed the wick.
sentences.cn: 她懒洋洋地走到桌子前、把灯芯朝外拨,灯花去掉.

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)激怒某人，使某人恼怒

trans.tran_cn: 蜡烛芯，（油灯的）灯芯，<英俚>不断烦扰某人，激怒某人
trans.tran_en: the piece of thread in a candle, that burns when you light it
